title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Integrating Environmental Sustainability Through AI-Assisted Experimental Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collect and interpret physics experiment data related to environmental sustainability using AI-based experimental tools.
Learners can propose design solutions applying energy efficiency and resource circulation principles during physics experiments.
Learners can write reports connecting AI-assisted experimental results to environmental problem-solving solutions through PBL (Problem-Based Learning) team activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
